**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
	   
### Details and Assumptions
* [document what you know]
	   
### Acceptance Criteria  
   
17.	 ```gherkin
18.	 Given [some context]
19.	 When [certain action is taken]
20.	 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
